description:
Matsuri joins Hina for a training session to improve her PriMagi skills, but Hina’s intense routine and unmatched passion leaves her feeling the burn!
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: A Crash Course with Hina-senpai! OMG, OMG, I`m Doomed!
Hina-senpai no Maji Tokkun! Yabai yo Yabai yo Maji Yabai yo!
ひな先輩のマジ特訓! ヤバいよヤバいよマジヤバいよ!
